scripts.cms-dev: mkdir -p vendor/a17/laravel-cms-toolkit/public npm run cms-copy-blocks && concurrently "cd vendor/a17/laravel-cms-toolkit && npm ci && npm run hot" "npm run cms-watch" && npm run cms-clean-blocks
scripts.cms-watch: concurrently "watch 'npm run cms-hot' vendor/a17/laravel-cms-toolkit/public --wait=2 --interval=0.1" "npm run cms-watch-blocks"
scripts.cms-prod: npm run cms-copy-blocks && cd vendor/a17/laravel-cms-toolkit && npm ci && npm run prod && cp -a public/. ${INIT_CWD}/public/
scripts.cms-copy-blocks: npm run cms-clean-blocks && mkdir -p resources/assets/js/blocks/ && mkdir -p vendor/a17/laravel-cms-toolkit/frontend/js/components/blocks/customs/ && cp -a resources/assets/js/blocks/. vendor/a17/laravel-cms-toolkit/frontend/js/components/blocks/customs/
